Package be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.J2D

Class Barrier

java.lang.Object
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.Abstract.Entity
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.Abstract.AbstractBarrier
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.J2D.Barrier
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants
public class Barrier extends AbstractBarrier implements Constants
This class is a superclass of AbstractBarrier. It defines the Barrier object.
It implements the Constants interface to use the constants.
